title: Shrieker
description: Giant, subterranean mushrooms that can creep around slowly.
extras: Shriek: Triggered by light (up to 60’ away) or movement (up to 30’ away). Shriek lasts for 1d3 rounds. Each round of the shriek, there is a 50% chance of a wandering monster being attracted (will arrive in 2d6 rounds).
